# ui-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                         | Type                                    | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Indicates if the button is disabled | `boolean`                               | `undefined` |
| `kind`     | `kind`     | Variant of the button               | `"default" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `"default"` |
| `label`    | `label`    | Label text of the button            | `string`                                | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | Size of the button                  | `"l" \| "m" \| "s"`                     | `"m"`       |
| `type`     | `type`     | Type attribute of the button        | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`       | `"button"`  |
